fields.title: Growing Lavender
fields.body:
Growing Lavender

This highly appealing shrub not only has an amazing scent but is also very easy to grow.

Lavender has beautiful purple, sky-blue or violet flowers. It is drought and deer tolerant. Lavender can be used for edging, hedges,containers and can also be used in cullanary or medical purposes. The most common lavender is called Lavandula angustifolia or True Lavender.

This lavender is mainly cultivated for its high quality oil. Lavender mainly flowers in late spring to mid summer.
fields.snippet: This highlyÂ appealing shrub not only has an amazing scent but is also very easy to grow.

fields.title: Medicinal Properties of Peppermint
fields.body:
Medicinal Properties of Peppermint

It has come to light that many grandmothers stories on how to use peppermint are in actual fact correct and efective.

Digestion - Pepermint is used for indigestion and bloating as it has the ability to expel gas from the intestines and stomach by relaxing the muscles involved.

Colds and Flu - Peppermint is a natural decongestant. It contains Menthol which thins the mucus and this reduces phlem and in turn reduces coughing. It also soothes sore throats.

Type 2 Diabetes - Tests have shown that peppermint may aid in lowering blood sugar. This comes with a warning - Using pepermint with some other medications may cause Hypoglycemia(low blood sugar).
fields.snippet: It has come to light that many grandmothers stories on how to use peppermint are in actual fact correct and efective.

fields.title: Growing Peppermint
fields.body:
Growing Peppermint

The mint family of plants are extreamly easy grow as they can grow in any type of soil. The plants are naturally found in moist soil near streams or ponds.Peppermint can be planted in partial shade but it is found that plants planted in full sun have an increased potency in their oils. The mint family spred naturally when growing so if you do not have a lot of space it can be planted in a pot.

Research has now revealed that many grandmothers stories on home remedies are in actual fact correct and effective.
fields.snippet: The mint family of plants are extreamly easy grow as they can grow in any type of soil.
